verses.verse: Answer <S%H6030><s%> me when I call, <S%H7121><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of my righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> Give me relief <S%H7337><s%> from my distress. <S%H6862><s%> Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> on me, <S%H8085><s%> and hear my prayer. <S%H8605><s%>

You sons <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H376><s%> how long <S%H5704><s%> shall my glory <S%H3519><s%> be turned into dishonor? <S%H3639><s%> Will you love <S%H157><s%> vanity, <S%H7385><s%> and seek <S%H1245><s%> after falsehood? <S%H3577><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
But know <S%H3045><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has set apart <S%H6395><s%> for himself him who is godly: <S%H2623><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will hear <S%H8085><s%> when I call to him. <S%H7121><s%>
Stand in awe, <S%H7264><s%> and don't <S%H2398><s%> sin. Search <S%H559><s%> your own heart <S%H3824><s%> on your bed, <S%H4904><s%> and be still. <S%H1826><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Offer <S%H2076><s%> the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of righteousness. <S%H6664><s%> Put your trust <S%H982><s%> in Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Many <S%H7227><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "Who will show <S%H7200><s%> us any good? <S%H2896><s%>" Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> let the light <S%H216><s%> of your face <S%H6440><s%> shine on us. <S%H216><s%>
You have put <S%H5414><s%> gladness <S%H8057><s%> in my heart, <S%H3820><s%> more than when <S%H6256><s%> their grain <S%H1715><s%> and their new wine <S%H8492><s%> are increased. <S%H7231><s%>

In peace <S%H7965><s%> I will both <S%H3162><s%> lay myself down <S%H7901><s%> and sleep, <S%H3462><s%> for you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh alone, <S%H910><s%> make me live <S%H3427><s%> in safety. <S%H983><s%>
